org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate

Class ListCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.impl.ChainImpl
      • org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate.AbstractQueryCommand
        • org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate.AbstractQueryResultCommand
          • org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate.ListCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xchain.Chain, org.xchain.Command

    @Element(localName="list")
public abstract class ListCommand
extends AbstractQueryResultCommand

    The list evaluates the Query as a list.

    This must reference a query.

    <xchain:session xmlns:xchain="http://www.xchain.org/hibernate/1.0"> <xchain:transaction> ... <xchain:query query="'from Entity'"> ... <list result="$myList"/> ... </xchain:query> ... </xchain:transaction> </xchain:session>
    Author:
    Devon Tackett, Christian Trimble, Josh Kennedy
    See Also:
    SessionCommand, Query.list()
